Export.Routine:
INBRUTTONETTO #include INConst ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ERRECHNEN VERKAUF NETTO AUS BRUTTO - RABATTE UND AUFSCHLAG (VOR MWST) ; ; EXECUTE IN FORMFIELD ; ; FIXME : <GRF> 4 different versions where a single entry with a byRef argument ; would do, plus a wrapper which updates the ^INAUFP global after ; calling the common routine. ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 11-Jul-2007 GRF SR15558: convert -(...*-1) to +(...); fix missing D71 check; ; if/else for form INAUFP check ; DT out of gr. And overcharge ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW YFELD,YI,NKOMMA,NETTO,YKEY
SET YFELD=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1)) ;DATENSATZ ;data record SET %TXT(1)="" SET %TXT(1)=$GET(%TXT(1)) ;IF $PIECE($GET(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)),Y,202)=1 DO ;VK=EK GENERELL !;FIS;28.12.04;HERAUS 2,1,2005;TYBD; ;. QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)=0 ;. NEW YII FOR YII=121,122,128,211 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YII)="" ;. IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=0 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=1 ;. SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,118)=$JUSTIFY(($PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)/$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)),0,2)
;IF YFORM'="INAUFP" SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,119)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)/$$^INQTYUNIT($PIECE(YFELD,Y,4))*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,118),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),119)) ;MENGE * PREIS ;quantity price ; SR15558 IF YFORM="INAUFP" { ;RECHNEN IN AUFTRAGSPOSITION;FIS;13.01.05 SET YKEY=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"P",1)) ;KEY SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,119)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)/$$^INQTYUNIT($PIECE(YFELD,Y,4),$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",1),$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",2))*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,118),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),119)) ;MENGE * PREIS ;quantity price } else { SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,119)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)/$$^INQTYUNIT($PIECE(YFELD,Y,4))*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,118),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),119)) ;MENGE * PREIS ;quantity price } SET NETTO=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,119) ;ERRECHNEN NETTO PREIS ;price IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,121) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,121)) IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,122) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,122)) IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,128) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,128)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,212) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,212)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,214) SET NETTO = NETTO + (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,214)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; SR15558 SET NETTO=NETTO+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,211) ;ZUSCHLAG BETRAG 210=BEGRÜNDUNG ;surcharge Sum SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,123)=$JUSTIFY(NETTO,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),123)) SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,116)=0 ;IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)'=0 { IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,71)'=0 { ; SR15558 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,116)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(YFELD,Y,123)/($PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,71))-1*100,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),116)) ;AUFSCHLAG ;overcharge } FOR YI=116,119,123 SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1),Y,YI)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI) FOR YI=118,119,123,116 SET %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_"D"_YI_"~"_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),YI)) FOR YI=211 SET %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_"D"_YI_"~"_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),YI)) FOR YI=121,122,128 DO . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)>100 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)=100 . SET %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_"D"_YI_"~"_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI),0,$LENGTH($PIECE($PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI),".",2)))
QUIT
EHWrapper(YFORM,&YFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Isolate YFORM and YFELD ; ; History: ; 27-Jul-2009 GRF SR16602: Call from INARTK now requires YFELD to be\ ; encapsulated. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do EH quit
EH ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; EINSPRUNG VON AUSSEN ; ; Called By Routines : (forms not listed) ; (YFELD) ; INANG1 objINANGP ; INANGKOST " ; INANGPNETTO " ; INARTK objINAUFP ; INAUF1 " ; INAUFEDIT " ; INAUFKOST " ; INAUFPD120 " ? ; INAUFPDISCOUNT " ; INAUFPNETTO " ; INFASTPNETTO objINFASTP ; INTAGES7 objINANGP ; INSERV220 objINAUFP ; INWORKPNETTO objINWORKP ; ; ByRef : ; YFELD = VORGABE ;default updates D116, D119, D123 ; ; History: ; 11-Jul-2007 GRF SR15558: convert -(...*-1) to +(...); remove unneeded + ; 14-Jun-2006 GRF SR14707: Doco; dot level ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW NETTO ;IF $PIECE($GET(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)),Y,202)=1 DO ;VK=EK GENERELL !;FIS;28.12.04;HERAUS 2,1,2005;TYBD; ;. QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)=0 ;. NEW YII FOR YII=121,122,128,211 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YII)="" ;. IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=0 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=1 ;. SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,118)=$JUSTIFY(($PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)/$PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)),0,2)
SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,119) = $JUSTIFY($PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)/$$^INQTYUNIT($PIECE(YFELD,Y,4))*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,118),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),119)) ;MENGE * PREIS ;quantity price
SET NETTO = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,119) ;ERRECHNEN NETTO PREIS ;price IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,121) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,121)) IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,122) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,122)) IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,128) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,128)) IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,212) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,212)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,214) SET NETTO = NETTO + (NETTO/100*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,214)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; SR15558 SET NETTO = NETTO+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,211) ;ZUSCHLAG BETRAG 210=BEGRÜNDUNG ;surcharge Sum SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,123) = $JUSTIFY(NETTO,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),123)) SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,116) = 0 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,71)'=0 { ; SR15558 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,116) = $JUSTIFY($PIECE(YFELD,Y,123)/($PIECE(YFELD,Y,47)+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,71))-1*100,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),116)) ;AUFSCHLAG ;overcharge } QUIT
EH1 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; EINSPRUNG VON AUSSEN ; ; Called By Routines : (forms not listed) ; (SATZ) ; INANG objINANGP ; INAUF objINAUFP ; INAUFANLAGE " ; ; ByRef : ; SATZ = VORGABE ;default updates D116, D119, D123 ; ; History: ; 11-Jul-2007 GRF SR15558: convert -(...*-1) to +(...); remove unneeded + ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW NETTO ;IF $PIECE($GET(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)),Y,202)=1 DO ;VK=EK GENERELL !;FIS;28.12.04;HERAUS 2,1,2005;TYBD; ;. QUIT:+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,47)=0 ;. NEW YII FOR YII=121,122,128,211 SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,YII)="" ;. IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,5)=0 SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,5)=1 ;. SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,118)=$JUSTIFY(($PIECE(SATZ,Y,47)/$PIECE(SATZ,Y,5)),0,2)
SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,119)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(SATZ,Y,5)/$$^INQTYUNIT($PIECE(SATZ,Y,4))*$PIECE(SATZ,Y,118),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),119)) ;MENGE * PREIS ;quantity price SET NETTO=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,119) ;ERRECHNEN NETTO PREIS ;price IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,121) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(SATZ,Y,121)) IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,122) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(SATZ,Y,122)) IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,128) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(SATZ,Y,128)) IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,212) SET NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$PIECE(SATZ,Y,212)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,214) SET NETTO = NETTO + (NETTO/100*$PIECE(SATZ,Y,214)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; SR15558 SET NETTO=NETTO+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,211) ;ZUSCHLAG BETRAG 210=BEGRÜNDUNG ;surcharge Sum SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,123)=$JUSTIFY(NETTO,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),123)) IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,47)+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,71)'=0 { ; SR15558 SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,116)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(SATZ,Y,123)/($PIECE(SATZ,Y,47)+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,71))-1*100,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),116)) ;AUFSCHLAG ;overcharge } else { SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,116)=0 } QUIT
EH2(YAUF,YPOS) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; EINSPRUNG VON AUSSEN : updates ^INAUFP record (D116, D119, D123) ; ; Called By Routines : (forms not listed) ; INAUFWH ; ; ByRef: ; YAUF = AUFTRAGSNUMMER VORGABE ;default ; YPOS = POSITIONSNUMMER ; ; History: ; 11-Jul-2007 GRF SR15558: replace code : convert -(...*-1) to +(...); ; remove unneeded +; use objOrderLine and vars ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; SR15558 vvvvv new curCost,curExtraCharges,curSalesPrice,curTotalSales,NETTO,objOrderLine
quit:$get(YAUF)="" quit:$get(YPOS)="" set objOrderLine = $get(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1)) quit:objOrderLine=""
set curTotalSales = $justify($$$INAUFPQuantity(objOrderLine)/$$^INQTYUNIT(,YAUF,YPOS)*$$$INAUFPUnitSalesPrice(objOrderLine),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),119)) ;D5/D118 set NETTO = curTotalSales if $piece(objOrderLine,Y,121) set NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$piece(objOrderLine,Y,121)) ; $$$INAUFPCustomerDiscount() if $piece(objOrderLine,Y,122) set NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$piece(objOrderLine,Y,122)) ; $$$INAUFPLineItemDiscount() if $piece(objOrderLine,Y,128) set NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$piece(objOrderLine,Y,128)) ; $$$INAUFPAdditionDiscount() if $piece(objOrderLine,Y,212) set NETTO = NETTO - (NETTO/100*$piece(objOrderLine,Y,212)) ; $$$INAUFPAdditionalDiscount() if $piece(objOrderLine,Y,214) set NETTO = NETTO + (NETTO/100*$piece(objOrderLine,Y,214)) ; $$$INAUFPPercentSurchargeDiscount() set NETTO = NETTO + $$$INAUFPSpecialSurcharge(objOrderLine) ; D211
set curSalesPrice = $justify(NETTO,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),123)) set curCost = $$$INAUFPCost(objOrderLine) + $$$INAUFPAmountOfPreparationTime(objOrderLine) ; D47/D71 if curCost'=0 { set curExtraCharges = $justify((curSalesPrice/curCost)-1*100,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),116)) } else { set curExtraCharges = 0 } ; FIXME : <GRF> Direct sets - not indexed set $$$INAUFPReachedAdditionalCharge(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1)) = curExtraCharges ; D116 set $$$INAUFPTotalSalesPrice(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1)) = curTotalSales ; D119 ;ERRECHNEN NETTO PREIS set $$$INAUFPNetSalesPrice(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1)) = curSalesPrice ; D123 quit
/* Replaces QUIT:$GET(YAUF)="" QUIT:$GET(YPOS)="" QUIT:$GET(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1))=""
NEW NETTO
SET $PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,119)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,5)/$$^INQTYUNIT(,YAUF,YPOS)*$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,118),0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),119)) ;MENGE * PREIS ;quantity price SET NETTO=$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,119) ;ERRECHNEN NETTO PREIS ;price IF +$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,121)'=0 SET NETTO=NETTO-(NETTO/100*$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,121)) IF +$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,122)'=0 SET NETTO=NETTO-(NETTO/100*$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,122)) IF +$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,128)'=0 SET NETTO=NETTO-(NETTO/100*$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,128)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; IF +$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,212)'=0 SET NETTO=NETTO-(NETTO/100*$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,212)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; IF +$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,214)'=0 SET NETTO=NETTO-(NETTO/100*($PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,214)*-1)) ;TYBD;19.2.2005;GEM EK=VK;27377; SET NETTO=NETTO+$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,211) ;ZUSCHLAG BETRAG 210=BEGRÜNDUNG ;surcharge Sum SET $PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,123)=$JUSTIFY(NETTO,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),123)) SET $PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,116)=0 IF +$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,47)+(+$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,71))'=0 SET $PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,116)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,123)/($PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,47)+$PIECE(^INAUFP(YM,YAUF,YPOS,1),Y,71))-1*100,0,$$^WWWDECIMALLEN($GET(YFORM),116)) ;AUFSCHLAG ;overcharge QUIT */
